rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with tactile paving and ramps. Large foyer for ample movement space.
Open-plan living room integrated with a kitchen area, following Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow by placing the main door in the east side.
Separate kitchen area near the living room. Designed with low counters and accessible design for wheelchair users. Adequate ventilation and lighting as per local building norms.
Dedicated home theater space integrated into the ground floor with soundproofing, comfortable seating, and adjustable ambient lighting.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, non-slip flooring, and sufficient turning radius. Located conveniently near living areas.
Dedicated dining space adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring ease of movement for wheelchair users and Vastu compliant positioning.

openings.description: Main entrance door with ramp accessibility.
Large window for natural light and ventilation in the living room.
Dedicated door to home theater room with soundproofing considerations.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for accessibility and privacy. Includes a built-in wheelchair-accessible closet.
Additional bedrooms adhering to accessible design standards ensuring door widths and clearances are compliant with local norms.
Wheelchair friendly bathroom attached to one of the additional bedrooms. Equipped with grab bars, non-slip surfaces, and adequate space for mobility.
A utility room designed for storage and laundry, ensuring easy access from both floors with a wheelchair-accessible path.

openings.description: Staircase with an adjacent ramp to ensure wheelchair accessibility between levels.
Windows for bedrooms ensuring proper ventilation and natural light as per Vastu.
